channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Traffic signal & yardage countdown warning sign is drastically faded and obscured by vegetation the bus stop pole / timetable., 25th November
item.description:
The traffic signal warning sign is drastically faded and obscured by vegetation by the bus stop pole/timetable which could lead to a vehicle-to-vehicle injury collisions if there is queuing traffic at the traffic signals.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A436, Andoversford, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign structurally damaged/leaning more than 20 degrees/loose in ground (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: Loose drain cover. Sunken. Is noisy and will cause damage to tyres, 25th November
item.description:
On the corner by the petrol station pirton lane. Caused by the work done to build the cycle path
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic lights ahead warning and yardage count sign is not easily readable due to dirty and tree algae, 25th November
item.description:
Noticed that existing traffic lights ahead warning and yardage count sign is not easily readable due to dirty and tree algae. Road users may not be aware of the traffic signals. Could result in collisions.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A436, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vegetation blocking direction signage, 25th November
item.description:
Vegetation is also blocking direction sign (maintenance required).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A436, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dirty Pavements, 25th November
item.description:
The pavements are 50% covered in wet and slimy leaves and are a danger to pedestrians some are still there from last year. The road gets done but not the pavements.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Robert Burns Avenue, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Line of grey alders - tall and some failing/dead, 25th November
item.description:
There is a line of tall grey alders adjacent to Primrose Vale car park, planted on Highways land which have become very tall with some dying and failing branches. I am the land owner of Primrose Vale and I worry that should one fail in winter storms, then this could cause a hazard to cars in the car park and on the A417 slip road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth Bypass, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No right hand turn sign into Shell Garage missing from traffic light posr, 25th November
item.description:
Traffic heading into Cheltenham along the A40 are making a right turn into Shell Garage at the traffic lights . I feel certain that there used to be a no right turn road sign there which disappeared when the traffic lights were upgraded
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign plate is missing (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: Flooding across road and path when it rains, 25th November
item.description:
Under the bridge, Big pool of water goes up over the path and floods the whole road in heavy rain. Cant actually see if there is a drain under the flood as its not cleared for weeks. I believe you have already had a look at it once. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Market Street, St Paulâ€™s, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: White Lines, 25th November
item.description:
White lines missing between lanes 1 and 2 when exiting towards Barnwood/Sainsburys Road markings were repainted but these appear to have been missed. Oversight/incomplete on behalf of contractor.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Elmbridge, Gloucester
